Plot: This is the story of Doogal, an adorable candy-loving mutt who goes on a mission to save the world. Doogal must prevent the evil sorcerer Zeebad from freezing the earth forever with the ...
Title: Doogal
Writer: Paul Bassett (screenplay), Martine Danot (characters), Serge Danot (characters), Serge Danot (creator), Serge Danot (screenplay), Butch Hartman (screenplay), Tad Safran (screenplay), Raolf Sanoussi (screenplay), Stephane Sanoussi (screenplay)
Actors: Daniel Tay, Jimmy Fallon, Jon Stewart, Whoopi Goldberg
tomatoConsensus: Overloaded with pop culture references, but lacking in compelling characters and plot, Doogal is too simpleminded even for the kiddies.
Director: Dave Borthwick, Jean Duval, Frank Passingham
